data.eml:eml: Myrmeleotettix Bolivar (Orthoptera, Gomphocerinae) in Anatolia on the basis of morphological and behavioural characters: data suggest a new species from southern end of the Anatolian refugium

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sirin, Deniz, Mol, Abbas, Ciplak, Battal (2011): Myrmeleotettix Bolivar (Orthoptera, Gomphocerinae) in Anatolia on the basis of morphological and behavioural characters: data suggest a new species from southern end of the Anatolian refugium. Zootaxa 2917: 29-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207270
